teams.name: Christians Against Abortion
teams.loan_because: We want to be obedient to Jesus Christ: 'But love your enemies, do good, and lend, expecting nothing in return; and your reward will be great, and you will be sons of the Most High...' Luke 6:35
teams.description:
A group of believers in Jesus Christ, ready to sacrifice to follow Him.    

---- (1) We are committed to defending the unborn.   

The words of Jesus speak strongly to us in the present situation: 
'And when Jesus saw it, he was angry, and said to them, Let the little children come to me, and do not keep them away; for of such is the kingdom of God.' Mark 10:14 
'Whoever receives this little child in my name receives me, and whoever receives me receives him who sent me.' Luke 9:48

---- (2) We are motivated by the biblical call to equality: 'For I do not mean that others should be eased and you burdened; but at the present time your abundance should supply their need, so that their abundance may supply your need, that there may be equality.' 2 Corinthians 8:13-14

---- (3) We want to build this team of like-minded poeple as a place of encouragment and care. 

Join, if you believe in all the words of Jesus.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://67.199.70.191/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx
Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising


Check out Charlotte's Web: http://starfish.dynalias.org

This watchlist for loans suggested by the team members (starfish + offlist) shows:
* the current position in the popularity ranking (considering pages 1 to 5)
* the timestamp of the most recent loan
* the basket amount
Click magnifier icon for more info.  Or read Charlotte’s post at @Charlotte re: #346848
Also known as "CW," or "Charlotte's Web of Wonders"


We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers usually add one or two of these loans at the end of the SF daily dozen lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

OPM - Abbreviation for "other people's money."  Our main lending method is to coordinate LLL team members' loans, so that we make several loans to a borrower within a short period of time. This will move the borrower's loan request up in Kiva's "popularity" sort and get the loan noticed by other people (non-members of the LLL team).  Many loans then get their funding completed by loans from those non-LLL members.  By attracting other lenders' attention to our Starfish loans in this way, we multiply the impact of our finite funds, and save more loans from expiring than we otherwise could.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many loans have their scheduled funding expiration times. This may happen when, for example, the volunteer coordinators at Kiva offer a promo of some kind to the editors & translators, to get them to do a lot of work in a very short period of time. Bulge loans are prime candidates for inclusion in Reduce the Red lists.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," the listmakers will include loans that have their red boxes, but more than 24 hours left before their deadline, to make up the 12 loans for the list. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Team Housebuilder
teams.loan_because: A lot of people really, really underestimate the difference a safe, secure home can make to someone's health, employability and financial security. If a person does not feel safe and secure, it is difficult for them to meet even their most basic of needs. Improving housing in an area also enriches the area as a whole, helps prevent people from becoming victims of crime, and gives parents a legacy for their children.
teams.description: We support loans that build homes, repair homes, improve homes, or directly aid production and distribution of construction materials, be they $75 for secure windows and doors, or $1500 for a new roof and running water.

teams.name: Person with Livestock
teams.loan_because: we want to support those small farmers and businesses worldwide who use animals in some fashion - for food, fertilizer, and/or transport.
teams.description:
We consider loans for men with cows, women with chickens, groups with pigs, or any combination of person(s) with animal(s). (Yes, pictures involving geese, sheep, goats, mules, oxen, donkeys, camels, or water buffalo all qualify.) 

Whether your grandmother raised poultry or you merely love specialty cheese produced from a local farm, consider supporting a hard-working farmer, herder, wagon driver, etc. today.

Believe in the power of moo!

teams.name: Supporters of Azerbaijan
teams.loan_because: we care / can / should
teams.description:
A team for people interested in supporting borrowers in Azerbaijan.

Some sample sites:

 * http://www.pbase.com/mcbit/azerbaijan
 * http://www.hansrossel.com/photos/azerbaijan/
* http://www.world66.com/europe/azerbaijan/
*http://www.eurasianet.org/
    THE source for up-to-date news of Central Asia...economic, political, cultural....will help you make sense of this complex part of the world.

teams.name: Disabled Persons
teams.loan_because: This is a community of people interested in making a difference for entrepreneurs  and families who are affected by illness or physical, intellectual, or psychiatric disability.  We also support caregivers, entrepreneurs involved in the medical profession and anyone who is touched in any way by disabilities, chronic illnesses or one time medical needs.
teams.description:
Anyone who has an interest in disability issues or rights may join our team. This team was started as a way to find and keep track of Kiva entrepreneurs who are affected by illnesses or disabilities so that we might see what kind of difference we are making in the lives of these entrepreneurs. 

This team was originally created by a group of KivaFriends, but has always been open to anyone.  If you are interested, you can read about the team history here:

teams.name: Women In Hats!
teams.loan_because: Hats need company.
teams.description: We like women in hats, caps, scarves, veils, crowns, beanies – you name it!  (We like men wearing that stuff too! :-)

teams.name: Supporting Widows and Single Parents
teams.loan_because: Widows and single parents face unique challenges in life. We just want to make it a bit easier for them.
teams.description: We loan to entrepreneurs who have been widowed or who are single parents.

- Punk Rock Song by Bad Religion
teams.description: Disgusted with the poverty around the world but still motivated to help.

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Women Who Lend To Shirtless Men
teams.loan_because: We can't resist :D

teams.name: Sinful Pleasures
teams.loan_because:
Even activities often subject to regulation and restraint give a culture its character and its entrepreneurs an opportunity.
Whether candy or coca, alcohol , fireworks or polygamy, cafes, pubs, and dance halls, CDs and videos, cosmetics,too......you and your business are welcome here!
teams.description:
Welcome to the world in all its guises!

The Taliban banned music and dance; now "Afghan Star" gives the people a taste of democracy as they can vote for their favorite singer.  A documentary movie of the same name is being shown in select theatres.  Check it out!

The Soviet Empire controlled interaction between its states.  Now the several ethnic groups on the Roof of the World meet to share music and dance.  See //eurasianet.org/ artcles to learn more.

teams.name: Group Loans
teams.loan_because: We feel that group loans provide people with more than just the money to start up or enhance their business.
teams.description:
This team is for people who want to help fund group loans. 

Group loans are most often bigger loans, and therefore more difficult to fund on Kiva.  We like to team up to make a big impact, one group loan at a time...

teams.name: Friends of Al Majmoua
teams.loan_because:
the Lebanese Association for development - Al Majmoua is an independent, Non Profit Non Governmental Organization helping people to progress out of poverty no matter if they are locals or Palestinian refugees in the camps in southern Lebanon.

Bob Harris (June 5th 2011): "I visited Al Majmoua, whom I adored, about six weeks ago. Great, wonderful people working their butts off. I really like and respect them"

Visit Al Majmoua`s website http://www.almajmoua.org and have a look at Al Majmoua´s Kiva page: http://www.kiva.org/partners/77 Al Majmoua has been checked not only by Kiva but also by MIX, which is a US based non profit organization that provides objective data and analysis on microfinance institutions http://www.mixmarket.org/mfi/al-majmoua Al Majmoua is participating in a microfinance institution network called Sanabel.
teams.description: This team is small but active. It currently consists of twentyfour members, some of which have experienced Al Majmoua and their work first hand or are there right now. Please join. The more the merrier. We value your input. One idea is to get Al Majmoua more known to lenders on Kiva by attributing loans towards this team which do not necessarily have a direct connection to Lebanon.

teams.name: Free Markets and Peace
teams.loan_because: free markets are the ground work for peace.
teams.description:
Peace and not war is the father of all things... Whoever wants peace among nations must seek to limit the state and its influence most strictly... The philosophy of protectionism is a philosophy of war... The liberal does not expect to abolish war by preaching and moralizing. He seeks to create the 
social conditions that will eliminate the causes of war.... Ludwig von Mises; economist, philosopher, writer (1881 - 1973).

teams.name: Ron Paul
teams.loan_because: Enabling entrepreneurship is WAY more effective than foreign aid.
teams.description: We are Kiva lenders who are dedicated to Ron Paul and his message of liberty.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Seattle
teams.description: The Seattle Kiva Lending Team is for people who love Kiva as much as they do Seattle.

teams.name: Boulder Business Builders
teams.loan_because: As fellow business owners we want to encourage entrepreneurship and self reliance in emerging markets all over the world.  Business owners supporting other business owners.
teams.description: We are business owners that meet monthly to share business ideas and help encourage each other with referrals and advice.

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: West Tisbury School
teams.loan_because: we know we can make a difference.
teams.description: Our team members are teachers, students, administrators and parents/guardians of the West Tisbury School

teams.name: santander
teams.loan_because: Por lo que cada uno considere oportuno.
teams.description: Gente diversa a la que los jueves les parece un día mejor que otros, se une en un grupo sin ningún interés particular.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Viet Nam Veterans For Progress
teams.loan_because: As young men and women we spent part of our youth in South East Asia and saw great poverty. We loan to  those who are still there so they may have a chance for a better life.
teams.description: We are mainly military veterans and their families who wish to once again help those who are less fortunate than ourselves.

teams.name: Libertarian Team
teams.loan_because: As libertarians, we favor voluntary charity over government force to bring about positive change.
teams.description: The libertarian philosophy is one of personal and economic freedom.  We advocate charity and free-markets over government coercion and force.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Microsoft
teams.description: Employees of Microsoft who care about making the world a better place through loans.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Fabric Of Life
teams.loan_because: Hand made textiles are an expression of many cultures world wide and we want to support people to keep these traditions alive and to help improve their lives.
teams.description: Textile lovers who want better lives for textile artisans throughout  the world

teams.name: Blue Ridge Summit Micro Loan Fund
teams.loan_because: We believe in sustainable advancement

teams.name: Families to Families
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of families helping others.
teams.description: A growing group of families who are bound together in peace, justice and fun.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

http://starfish.dynalias.org/

http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Lowery Family and Friends
teams.loan_because: We Can
teams.description: This team is for members of the Lowery family and our friends. It helps us see what is up with our friends.

teams.name: Team Cluny
teams.loan_because: We want to help others become self-sufficient.
teams.description: Family and Friends.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: Reser's Reciprocators
teams.loan_because: We're part of a family-owned food company who believes in reciprocating our good fortune. We lend to other family-owned companies and individuals running food businesses of their own.
teams.description: Right now we're just a bunch of Marketing geeks looking to make a difference!

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

teams.description: Help through education...

teams.name: Yale Undergraduate Microfinance Society
teams.loan_because: We believe in microfinance as one of many tools that can be used to alleviate poverty at the global level.
teams.description: We are a group of undergraduates at Yale University who are interested in studying microfinance. In addition to studying it ourselves, we seek to educate other undergraduates about the microfinance movement and how they can contribute to it themselves.

teams.name: UC Santa Cruz Banana Slugs for Economic Empowerment
teams.loan_because: We support empowerment through access to economic opportunities

teams.name: Kiva Slugs
teams.loan_because: we're slugs!  We went to a school where social action was encouraged.
teams.description: We're alums of UC Santa Cruz who have an interest in micro-lending and doing something to help those in countries where the economic system is either oppressive or not conducive to upward movement.

teams.name: Alex's Birthday
teams.loan_because: It is a nice thing to do

teams.name: Wild Horse
teams.loan_because: We have so much in America, and we must be our sisters' and brothers' keeper.
teams.description: We are residents of the Wild Horse community in Hereford, Arizona

teams.name: Something Massive
teams.loan_because:
Our business relies on the intelligence and innovation of partners from around the world.  We believe in the global marketplace and have experienced the ways that technology has and will continue to make our world more tightly knit.  

For each new client we win, we finance an entrepreneur in an effort to give back to the global market that supports our agency.
teams.description: We are the employees, clients, partners, and friends of a digital advertising agency called Something Massive.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Something Massive
teams.loan_because:
Our business relies on the intelligence and innovation of partners from around the world.  We believe in the global marketplace and have experienced the ways that technology has and will continue to make our world more tightly knit.  

For each new client we win, we finance an entrepreneur in an effort to give back to the global market that supports our agency.
teams.description: We are the employees, clients, partners, and friends of a digital advertising agency called Something Massive.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Seattle Women's Chorus
teams.loan_because: We come together weekly and enjoy singing together. This is a way to have our voices heard around the world, helping those who need it.
teams.description:
Our Vision--A world that accepts and values its gay and lesbian citizens.

Our Mission--Seattle Men's Chorus and Seattle Women's Chorus entertain, enlighten, unify and heal our audience and members, using the power of words and music to recognize the value of gay and straight people and their relationships.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Happily Ever After
teams.loan_because: Every story could use a happy ending.
teams.description: Readers, writers and lovers of romance fiction.

teams.name: ArcticStartup community
teams.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place to live in - through entrepreneurship.
teams.description: We are the readers of ArcticStartup, entrepreneurs in the Nordics and Baltics, investors, or any other stakeholder being affiliated with entrepreneurship. We're looking to create a better ecosystem for entrepreneurship in the Nordics and Baltics, but wish to help people elsewhere as well.

teams.name: Overclock.net
teams.loan_because: Overclockers care.
teams.description: We love computers and technology.

teams.name: VerticalResponse
teams.loan_because: At VerticalResponse we support the entrepreneurial spirit. With over 50,000 small business and non profit customers, we are proud to match our employees donations.
teams.description: We offer self service online marketing tools to small businesses and non profit organizations. Whether you want to send an email marketing campaign to your customers, a survey or a direct mail postcard, it's all at your fingertips with VerticalResponse.

teams.name: J&V Law Generations
teams.description: The off spring of John & Virginia Law of Atlanta, Georgia

teams.name: Kiva Korea
teams.loan_because: We have a common interest of directly helping those who need help and support the independent nature of microfinance.
teams.description: We are people connected simply by living in Korea, whether Korean citizens or foreigners living here.

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Hansen
teams.loan_because: we hope it helps.
teams.description: Family

teams.name: MediaMiser
teams.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurs
teams.description: A company that cares about others

teams.name: Camosy Survivors
teams.loan_because: We are in solidarity with the most vulnerable.  They are our brothers and sisters.
teams.description: Most of us have been victims of the classroom of Charlie Camosy, a professor of ethics in New York.

teams.name: Wavemetrix
teams.loan_because: To help others achieve their business and personal goals.
teams.description:
WaveMetrix is the global leader in buzz research. We are the only major social media monitoring company to not just capture buzz, but actually read it.
Please join and help make our team loan as much as possible to entrepreneurs around the world.

teams.name: WLYS
teams.loan_because: We strongly believe that with a little amount of money is possible to make great changes!

teams.name: People who Love Jane...
teams.loan_because: We loan in memory of Jane Burton who's life was ended before she was able to realize her plans to help others.... We invite her friends, classmates and family to help others by lending to people far less fortunate than we.... and once that loan is re-paid, reinvest that same money in another person who needs help inproving their life and the lives of their families.... Thank You, Tim, Valerie & Hilary
teams.description: People who want to honor Jane by helping to improve the lives of others...

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Wavemetrix
teams.loan_because: To help others achieve their business and personal goals.
teams.description:
WaveMetrix is the global leader in buzz research. We are the only major social media monitoring company to not just capture buzz, but actually read it.
Please join and help make our team loan as much as possible to entrepreneurs around the world.

teams.name: WLYS
teams.loan_because: We strongly believe that with a little amount of money is possible to make great changes!

teams.name: The Human Fund - Money For People
teams.loan_because: George and Frank Costanza continue to inspire us all.
teams.description: A Festivus for the rest of us!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: ForeverConcepts
teams.loan_because: We can. We are on a mission to facilitate 10,000 new loans to Kiva entrepreneurs. And then 10.000 more, and then...... and then..........
teams.description: ForeverConcepts Traffic Exchange is a Purpose driven online traffic generation community dedicated to driving traffic, signups and sales to our members sites.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.

teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: 101 Cookbooks
teams.loan_because: There were nearly a million visits to 101 Cookbooks last month - a statistic that continues to amaze me. As the site has grown over the years, I kept thinking to myself that it would be great to figure out a way for us to affect change as a group - Kiva (with its team lending) is a great way for us to do that.
teams.description: Readers of Heidi Swanson's online recipe journal (blog) 101cookbooks.com

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Team Kansas City
teams.loan_because: We love the idea of empowering other people to help themselves.
teams.description: We are proud residents of a wonderful town.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: The Human Fund - Money For People
teams.loan_because: George and Frank Costanza continue to inspire us all.
teams.description: A Festivus for the rest of us!

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Wavemetrix
teams.loan_because: To help others achieve their business and personal goals.
teams.description:
WaveMetrix is the global leader in buzz research. We are the only major social media monitoring company to not just capture buzz, but actually read it.
Please join and help make our team loan as much as possible to entrepreneurs around the world.

teams.name: Textile Artists for Global Change
teams.loan_because: We have a common interest in moving toward positive change through textile art.
teams.description: A group of people inspired by Anna Hergert who are interested in textile art. We may have met in workshops or stay connected across distances through Anna's website and blog.

teams.name: Happy Bottoms Diaper Service
teams.loan_because:
At Happy Bottoms Diaper Service, we believe that a business can be a vehicle for social change.  As a mother-owned and  operated small business, we have taken the utmost care to work with socially conscious, environmentally responsible organizations, and, whenever possible, partner with “work-at-home mom”- or locally-owned businesses. 

We focus on lending to mother-owned business entrepreneurs around the world to help them to achieve economic independence and improve life for themselves, their family, and their community. Just as we are trying to "change the world one diaper at a time," we lend because we are trying to change the world one micro-loan at a time.
teams.description: Happy Bottoms Diaper Service is a cloth diaper service based in Anchorage Alaska, offering weekly pick-up and delivery of quality cloth diapers, reusable wipes and other products that we confidently use with our own infants.  Our Kiva team is open to our suppliers, customers and cloth diaper advocates around the world.

teams.name: Overclock.net
teams.loan_because: Overclockers care.
teams.description: We love computers and technology.

teams.name: Twitter Friends
teams.loan_because: the microlending method empowers the entrepreneur to grow and develop their business enabling them to succeed on their own
teams.description: diverse group of people brought together 140 characters at a time

teams.name: Iniciador
teams.loan_because: We are an entrepreneur community
teams.description:
Iniciador es una comunidad de emprendedores que tiene como objetivo fomentar y facilitar el emprendizaje.

Más información en iniciador.com

teams.name: Shenandoah Lending Alliance
teams.loan_because: Together we can help.  Clean water, enough to eat, and self-sufficiency is our hope for people all over the world.
teams.description: We believe we are richly blessed to live in the beautiful Shenandoah Valley of Virginia and we wish to share our good fortune with as many as we can.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

teams.name: Diaspora*
teams.loan_because: We want to change the world
teams.description: Users of the social network Diaspora working together to make a difference

teams.name: Planeta Feliz
teams.description: Founded by young professionals and social entrepreneurs, Planeta Feliz is dedicated to helping create a happier and sustainable world through education, medical care, small business development, structural work and humanitarian assistance — one family, one community at a time.
